name: Space Fish Brisbane Odyssey
description:
The fair of Madrid was truly a treasured memory of the intergalactic explorer, with the collection of balloons to seal the deal of joy. 

In the vast expanses of space, there are astronomically amazing features that range from magnetic field disrupting neutron stars to mystical cloud-like nebula with half-shattered colored moons.

But Space Fish has seen all that. 

Its time to return to Earth, this time to a city in Australia. 

Why exactly Brisbane?

Because the Space Fish wanted to see what's in Brisbane.

From its South Bank Ferris Wheel to its legendary pillar status Ibises chewing on some chips by the pond, come join Space Fish on this exploration adventure in the delights of Brisbane!

Made by Noran

Music: "Twilight" by Deep Intruder
